about_the_game:
The year was 2123, and the world as we know it was devastated. World powers had clashed together to test their might and the only result was the destruction of Earth.

All of the major world powers had activated their defense mechanisms, causing our home, planet Earth, to wither into desolation. The attack between nations was measured by immense consequences suffered by not only the people but Earth as well.

Nuclear warheads were launched from each of the world powers which blanketed our world in radioactive clouds, and causing a mass extinction of most life on Earth.

Only a small population managed to survive the chaos the powers ensued. The ones that survived decided to collect all the DNA that was not contaminated by the radioactivity, with the purpose of start life anew on other planet like Earth.

It was called Project Ark and it was humanity’s last hope.  

Travel through the universe discovering every planet, where you will have to find the capsules lost throughout the universe. You will be with Nail, the astronaut chosen to carry out the mission of carrying the DNA capsules.

You will be able to use a laser gun to protect yourself from entities from the universe or known as aliens where you will discover the truth or a part of this great story that surrounds our protagonist.

The capsules will be the main key to advance on each planet, they will be on each planet you visit but you will have to fight with many hordes of aliens.

name: Astronaut Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10, macOS 10.12+, or a compatible Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent (2.0 GHz+)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics or equivalent).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, macOS 10.14+, or an optimized Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent (2.5 GHz+)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: High-quality stereo or surround sound system
